text: The Arnold Palmer is a non-alcoholic beverage. It combines iced tea and lemonade. The name refers to the professional American golfer Arnold Palmer, who was known to often request and drink this beverage combination; some attribute the invention of the beverage to the golfer. it is made by many companies like but not only Arizona Beverage Company who sell it in cans and large cardboard crates of cans as well as plastic bottles.it is sold in many places such as supermarkets and grocery stores. it is also sold in some restraunts that offer it on there menu. it is belived to have been invented in part by profssional golfer Arnold Palmer who commonly asked for it at restraunts. Category:Soft drinks
title: Arnold Palmer (drink)
